short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds tooltips to webpages for all the creatures, items, and keywords of Slice & Dice™.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Slice & Dice™ has a lot of cool content, but sometimes it's hard to remember the specifics of every hero and monster when you're discussing them online.  inflict-wisdom is here to make that easier.

When someone mentions "Housecat" in the S&D subreddit or discord, there's no need to rack your brain to remember what abilities that hero has.  Just mouse over it to see exactly what you would see in the game!

* Includes all Heroes, Monsters, Items, Keywords, etc.
* Up to date with Slice & Dice™ v3.0.15
* Uses original game art (with permission)
* Nested tooltips for hero/monster moves and spells
* Can be enabled everywhere or for specific sites or pages, such as Reddit, Twitch, or Discord
